section.name: Overview
section.p: This e-mail endpoint implements an Endpoint for the SMTP internet mail system. With this endpoint, a workflow can:

ol.li: send an e-mail and block until a reply is received
start a new conversation when a new e-mail is received

section.p: See javadoc and Hangman sample for more details.

section.name: Technical Details
section.p: This endpoint is implemented by using JavaMail. Out-going e-mails are sent by talking to a SMTP server, and the only thing that needs to be configured is the SMTP server's address. Incoming e-mails can be fetched from various sources, such as POP3, IMAP4, and the Maildir format. All of them are fetched by polling. It's up to a program to configure an endpoint.
